parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns object's model info in format [modelName, modelPath, hasSkeleton]. Model path is suitable for use with [[createSimpleObject]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getModelInfo''' object
</value></part><part><name> p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [modelName, modelPath, hasSkeleton]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_modelInfo = [[getModelInfo]] [[player]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_modelInfo = [[getModelInfo]] [[cursorObject]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[cursorObject]], [[cursorTarget]], [[createSimpleObject]], [[getObjectType]], [[getObjectTextures]], [[allMissionObjects]], [[setObjectViewDistance]], [[setObjectViewDistance]], [[objectParent]], [[object]]
</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
